original_title: In the Shadow of the Towers: Stuyvesant High on 9/11
overview: Eight student eyewitnesses from Stuyvesant High School in New York City recount their experiences of the Twin Towers attack on September 11, 2001, who as young teenagers, found themselves fleeing debris in the heart of the danger zone and faced with a harrowing journey home.
title: In the Shadow of the Towers: Stuyvesant High on 9/11
